item.title: Tutorial 1
item.description: Oompa Loompa , yet Snekkity Snek. I’m back. Hello everyone , Time for some Sneky Snek. I mean Python. print("Hello Mom") Question = "Why are you so fat ?" print(Question) So this is how to start coding Make sure you show your mother your first code. She’ll be proud. Anyways back to reality. More python. So , what do we do now ? Lets go over some conditions print("Hey Mom.") Answer = input("Are you there ?

item.title: Morning Motivation
item.description: Everything seems normal. Yet it’s not how it’s meant to be. Python , I’m talking about Python. Too easy , yet so difficult. Oompa Loompa , yet sneketyy snek. Thanks , I’ll go back to god.
